alert.note: Alert for Attala; Grenada; Jasper; Leake; Montgomery; Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 20 at 2:18AM CDT until March 20 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning Monday morning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23. For the Freeze Watch Tuesday morning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Grenada, Montgomery, Attala, Leake, Scott, Smith and Jasper Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 10 AM CDT this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Grenada; Jasper; Leake; Montgomery; Scott; Smith
